content: chevron kitchen towel introduction kitchen towel pattern is easily modified to any length or width chevron pattern is 14 stitch repeat any cotton weight yarn can be used techniques used - k knit - p purl - kfb knit front/back - k2tog knit two together - s slip_stitch knitwise - psso pass slipped stitch over -cast on/bind off materials yarn used - universal yarn cotton supreme 100% cotton - 100g /180 yds per skein worsted weight finished towel uses approx 90 grams colors used - jade spring green needles 4 0mm/us6 finished measurements approx 9 x 20 pattern notes cast on 58 stitches long tail cast on rs row - k1 * k1fb k4 s1 k1 psso k2tog k4 k1fb repeat * 3 times slip last stitch yarn in front ws row - k1 p56 slip last stitch yarn in front repeat to desired length ending with ws row cast off knit stitch cast off finishing block weave in ends c renee brooks - alternating skeins may 2025
